screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .birds file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
screenshot.caption: BIRDS file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code

description: Bird Script is a programming language and interpreter developed by ySTACK. At the time of this writing, Bird Script is still in development, so not much is known about the language, how it functions, or what kinds of programs it is best suited for. However, ySTACK has confirmed that Bird Script's source code files will be saved as BIRDS files.
